body.name: Gillette Venus Intimate Grooming Womens Razor Blade Refills with Bikini Trimmer, 4 Count (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 mins
features: Don't settle for shave bumps and ingrowns. These razors have a patented irritation defense bar for a smooth shave with blades that barely touch the skin
Smooth shave: venus's sharpest blades easily cut through hair
Designed for tricky areas: The razor has a small head and a precision Trimmer on the back of the blades to help reach tricky areas
All Venus for Pubic Hair and Skin blade refills fit all Venus for Pubic Hair and Skin razor handles
body.description: Venus's pubic hair and skin razor is specifically designed to help protect pubic skin from shave irritation. Its Patented irritation defense bar and optimally spaced blades allow the blades to cut hair while barely touching the skin. Also, the razor refills come equipped with a precision Trimmer on the back of the blades to help with tricky areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this so much I subscribe and here is why:
reviews.reviewText: I have trie many but nothing works for the bikini line. No cuts, no bumps, no itching! Fantastic! I am so very happy with Venus and love getting refills. It is top notch! I dont know what more I could ask for something that does it all! I have even used it for those pesky face hairs and no cuts. It works great for the popular face shaving to remove fine hair we dont see so foundation is so much smoother. Still no cuts or problems there! The refills are the easiest I have used. I highly recommend this for all these reasons and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magic? it's just a razor.
reviews.reviewText: okay seriously I was really skeptical that these would be different from the sensitive disposable ones that I use for legs and underarms, but they really are different. these seem to cause me to not have to shave my pubic area as often. they don't irritate and somehow honestly it feels more gentle than other razors. it is also able to get the closest shave ever. I have also not experienced any razor bumps or ingrown hairs although I am not normally very susceptible to them.anyway I'm just back to reorder again for the 3rd time. heck this might be the first and only thing I get on recurring order, that is how good they are. I do wish the refills also came with covers.I would suggest to only use this for your pubic area. I have no clue why people are using this for their legs and then complaining about it; it says on the package that it is for pubic hair. and instead of shave creams perhaps people should try a gentle non foaming face wash. I use Kate Somerville goat milk face cleanser and it is perfect as a shave cream down there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product to avoid razor bumps
reviews.reviewText: These razors are great cause they’re not so close to the skin that you risk cuts or bumps. I use them for all areas of my body. I think these are some of the best razors out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best razor out there for intimate places
reviews.reviewText: I'm in love with this razor! It makes my life so much easier. My husband started buying cheaper razors and I have to tell you this is luxury next to Harry's razors. 1 pass and the hairs gone. I do wish it had an electrical trimmer from time to time. However I'm over the moon with the ease of use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using a Venus razor for a few years now and I love it! I’m finding that I don’t get any cuts on my legs and that they are nice and soft whenever I shave my legs. They are super easy to use and don’t rust as easily as other razors do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this razor and the blades
reviews.reviewText: So amazing and gentle on your skin. I’ll never use another again. Expensive? Yes. Worth it? Yes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No razor bump/burns!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is the only razor I’ve ever used that have never given me razor bumps or burns. It’s definitely pricey but worth it. They last multiple uses as well (up to 10 uses). It has a very close cut which allows me to go longer better shaves. I also have never cut myself using this razor and I’ve been using these razors for at least 2 years. If you have sensitive skin these are the razors for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have this on auto pay every three months for delivery
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this razor so I have these blades on reorder every three months and they’re decently priced.

I have been buying and using those for a few months now.I like them a lot, except for the fact that the hydration bar at the top of the blades is pretty cheap. It almost always end up breaking or falling off. Once it happened while I was shaving and resulted in me cutting myself.Other than that, it gets the job done and is for the most part really effective.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does NOT fit typical Venus razor handle
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to try these 'special' blades to see if they worked as advertised - reducing the irritation and bumps in the pubic area when shaving...they do, but not a complete reduction. Thing is, any time you have to make a pass more than once over the same area will result in irritation and the more passes the more irritated it gets. So, the key is to shave more frequently so fewer passes are needed!What aggravated me and reduced my review to just 3 stars was the fact that I had to buy a new handle just to use this pkg of blades. I first purchased blades only as I already had 2 'Venus Gillette' handles for razors and since they are named the same I expected the handles I had would fit. Of course they did not and although I was in a local store looking for the handle that would work, (the white one) I could not find one and ended up ordering it on Amazon too. I've added photos so you can see the difference between the handle heads and why these blades won't fit the other handles with the same name.I'm disgusted with Gillette for the waste of plastic and handles because they cannot be bothered to make handles with a consistent head!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good for Everywhere BUT Pubic Region
reviews.reviewText: I had high hopes for this product, I've actually been using it for a year but I find I get the worse in-growns down there because of this razor, no matter how much I exfoliate and prep. It has never been this bad until I used this product. It's great for underarms and everywhere else but ironically gives me painful in-growns for pubic hair ( I always keep clean razors and switch out the blades often). No razor bumps at least but I will have to keep looking for a better one for down there. The only downside I'd say is that it doesn't give the cleanest shave but is quite gentle. I will keep using this on legs, stomach and underarms as I continue laser hair removal.
Its a razor. It cuts. Works
